George Santos Sues Jimmy Kimmel for Pranking Him on Cameo  —  The Republican fraudster wants at least $750,000 in damages.  —  “Put up or shut up,” former congressman George Santos likes to tell his haters.  Now, he's adding late night host Jimmy Kimmel to that list.
